General.Name: Speed Tech
General.Description: Speed Tech Corp. designs, research and develops, manufactures, and sells connectors for use in communication, computers, automotive, and consumer industries in Taiwan and internationally. It offers pitch board to board connectors; USB TYPE C receptacle and plug connectors; RF switches and coaxial connectors; RJ45 connectors; HDD connectors, mini SAS HD, slim SAS pin, and OCuLink connectors; SMT products, including ASM mounters; 5G indoor and outdoorCPE, 5G Mifi, GPON, Wi-Fi routers, and cable modems; and docking and automotive electronic products. The company also engages in reinvestment and trading activities; and the manufacturing and processing of remote control buttons; production and sale of computer peripherals, data storage media, electronic components, and consumer electronics accessories. In addition, it manufactures and sells metal stamping parts, plastic injection parts, other iron and steel products, and other copper products; and manufactures, and sells electric wires and cables, photoelectric switch, precise molds, plastic hardware, and plastic molding products. Further, it sells printed circuit boards. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 568, Minsheng North Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33393
